metadata.title: CVE-2023-40549 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read flaw was found in Shim due to the lack of properboundary verification during the load of a PE binary. This flaw allows anattacker to load a crafted PE binary, triggering the issue and crashingShim, resulting in a denial of service.

criterions.comment: secureboot-db package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
shim-signed package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
shim package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
